SUBJECT: Frank - Dreamlab Technologies development

Hi Frank,

I've been following companies in the computer & network security space.

I'm David Ariyo, a Full Stack Developer. I recently built Durl URL Shortener - URL shortening with analytics, rate limiting, thousands of monthly redirections

Tech: Next.js, Node.js, MongoDB, SHA-256 | Scale: Thousands of monthly redirections

Would you be open to a brief chat if Dreamlab Technologies ever needs freelance development support?

Best regards,
David Ariyo
Full Stack Developer
